subtitles.transcript: My registrar. They called her Fanta. Fanta Fofana.
Then the free volunteer. He was the GCHV [general community health volunteer] secretary - Sekou.
He used to always tell me, “Pa, wear your gloves-o! Dont’ forget-o!”
He used to advise me. Then he left me [died].
So those are some of the problems sometimes when I lie [down] I think, “Why God [did] this happen?”
